title: Breaking point
creator_credit: Jack Smith and Granada Television International
brief_description: This film on safety shows how spinal injuries may be caused by incorrect posture during the lifting or pushing of heavy objects. Injuries due to car accidents are discussed and the use of seatbelts ito minimise accidents is demonstrated.
